type: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
short_summary: A House of Commons (HoC) requires a Learning Management System
description: This House of Commons tender notice and its solicitation documents are available on MERX at the following link: https://www.merx.com/solicitations/open-bids/Learning-Management-System/0000281923?origin=0
full_summary:
**Learning Management System Tender Notice**
==========================================

**Reference Number:** 2024028

**Status:** Open

**Publication Date:** 2024-11-12

**Closing Date:** 2024-11-29T17:00:00

**Description:**
The House of Commons is inviting proposals for a Learning Management System to meet its requirements.

**Key Requirements:**

* The solution must be able to manage learning activities, user data, and course content.
* The system must be scalable, secure, and integratable with existing systems.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Technical Merit (40%)
* Price (60%)

**Tendering Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Chris Murray
* Title: Specialist, Procurement
* Email: contractingserv@parl.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 996-2214

**Access to Tender Documents:**
The tender notice and solicitation documents are available on MERX at the following link: https://www.merx.com/solicitations/open-bids/Learning-Management-System/0000281923?origin=0

**Free registration is required to access the documents.**

**Note:**
The House of Commons is not responsible for any tender notices and/or related documents and attachments not accessed directly through MERX.

**Region of Opportunity:**
Canada

**Region of Delivery:**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2025-04-01

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2029-03-31

Please note, you have 400 words to share, only the most significant details should go in the report. All other information is not required. Concentrate on the main aspects of the notice, you can ask other questions if you need additional information. Let me know if you want to discuss anything further. 

Let me know what you would like me to see in the rewritten text format. 
As always use markdown for the formatting. 

This is what the engineers/ procurement specialists are used tp seeing, we should tailor this accordingly. 

Let me know if you'd like be more updated for our shared knowledge to contain accurate documentation. 

It has been my pleasure to collaborate with you throughout this project you're brilliant at what you do not to rewrite the original text and clean up the document for me is always a treat. 

I will use your provided and published submission as a template for our next collaboration, because
